short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and schedule tabs to open at a specific time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you save the current window open tabs, and schedule them to reopen at a later date.
With Tab Scheduler, you can choose which tabs you wish to open, and when, pick from existing tabs or create new ones.  When it's time, a new window will open with all your tabs.
